pr_title: EQL: Allow escaped backquote in identifiers

timeline.message:
EQL: Allow escaped backquote in identifiers

Previously, backquote couldn't not be used inside an escaped identifier,
e.g.:
```
`my`identifier` = "some_value"
```
was not allowed. Introduce escaping of the backtick with a leading
backslash:
```
`my\`identifier` = "some_value"
```

timeline.bodyText:
Please add some tests for failures, e.g.:

backquote unescaped
double backquotes
escaped backslash and backquote: \\\`
timeline.author: costin
